Congratulations! Your company profile has been approved and is now active on Proven at {{ vendor_url }}. We approve a small percentage of the applications that we receive. This approval is a testament to the quality of your client relationships, which we fully recognize takes years of hard work. 

Our ranking robot loves firms with deep relationships at high quality clients. So we encourage you to reach out to other clients through Proven for further recognition and high-fives.

We are in the process of building a rich source of high quality client leads for you. Sometimes, it can take a few weeks or months for the initial leads to come through. So keep up the great work and stay tuned. 

And finally, we deeply appreciate that you have trusted us with your most precious asset, your client relationships, and we are committed to honoring that trust.

{{ clients_add_url }}

Thanks for being part of the Proven Community,
Suzanne Jordan, COO
